short_description: fastpath function for transforming the data from high dimensional space to low dimensional space using RandomProjection algorithm.
long_description: fastpath function for transforming the data from high dimensional space to low dimensional space using RandomProjection algorithm.

input_tables.name: FitTable
input_tables.rDescription: The FitTable input contains the output generated by TD_RandomProjectionFit function.
input_tables.description: The FitTable input contains the output generated by TD_RandomProjectionFit function.

input_tables.name: InputTable

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
